name: enumerator
label: Name of enumerator

name: A
label: Introduction

name: consent
label: My name is ${enumerator}. We are conducting a joint assessment on behalf of the humanitarian community to better understand the needs and situation of your household. The survey should take about 40 minutes to complete.  Any information that you provide will be confidential and also anonymous. This is voluntary and you can choose not to answer any or all of the questions; however we hope that you will participate since your views are important.  Do you have any questions? Are you willing to be interviewed?

name: time.in.settlement
label: How long have you been in this settlement?

name: respondent.type
label: Are you interviewing a refugee or host community member?

name: refugee.settlement
label: In which refugee settlement is this interview taking place?

name: refugee.settlement.zone
label: In which zone of ${refugee_settlement} is this interview taking place?
relevant: selected(${refugee_settlement}, "bidibidi") or selected(${refugee_settlement}, "imvepi") or selected(${refugee_settlement}, "rhino_camp") or selected(${refugee_settlement}, "nakivale") or selected(${refugee_settlement}, "palorinya")

name: refugee.settlement.zone.other
label: In which zone of ${refugee_settlement} is this interview taking place?
hint: Other, please specify:

name: district
label: In which district is this interview taking place?

name: subcounty
label: In which subcounty is this interview taking place?

name: place
label: In which village or town is this interview taking place?

name: place.other
label: In which village or town is this interview taking place?
hint: Other, please specify:

name: strata
label: Settlement or district strata for HC/refugee

name: point.number
label: What is the number of the point on the map you are surveying at?

name: respondent.age
label: How old are you?
hint: Respondent must be at least 15. If not, cancel the survey and proceed to the next sample.
constraint_message: The inputted age is below 15 or above 120.

name: respondent.sex
label: Sex of the respondent
hint: Do not ask this question, use observation.

name: head.of.household
label: Are you the head of household and able to speak with knowledge about the household?
hint: Respondent must be able to speak for the household and about the household in general, including on hygiene and water consumption practices, food security, and more. If not, proceed to the next household.

name: hoh.equivalent
label: We want to know about needs, vulnerabilities and the situation of your household, can you answer for the whole household on behalf of the head of household?
hint: Respondent must be able to speak for the household and about the household in general, including on hygiene and water consumption practices, food security, and more. If not, proceed to the next household.

name: respondent.telephone
label: What is a telephone number we can contact you at if we have any further questions?
hint: Skip if the respondent does not want to provide a telephone number or does not have one.
constraint_message: Must be a valid 10-digit Ugandan telephone number

name: B
label: Household demographics

name: hoh.sex
label: What is the sex of the head of household?
hint: Make sure you ask for the sex of the Head of Household (person that makes decisions for the family) and not just the interviewee.

name: marital.status
label: What is the marital status of the head of household?
hint: Make sure you ask for the marital status of the Head of Household (person that makes decisions for the family) if the interviewee is not the HoH.

name: nationality
label: What is the nationality of the head of household?
hint: Make sure you ask for the nationality of the Head of Household (person that makes decisions for the family) if the interviewee is not the HoH.
constraint_message: If Head of Household is Ugandan, go back and change to host community member.

name: nationality.other
label: What is the nationality of the head of household?
hint: Other, please specify:

name: b1
label: Household population
hint: Members of the household who regularly share resources, such as water, food, and living space; not temporary visitors such as friends and family

name: males.0.2
label: Males 0-2
constraint_message: Must be above 0 and under 25

name: females.0.2
label: Females 0-2
constraint_message: Must be above 0 and under 25

name: males.3.5
label: Males 3-5
constraint_message: Must be above 0 and under 25

name: females.3.5
label: Females 3-5
constraint_message: Must be above 0 and under 25

name: males.6.12
label: Males 6-12
constraint_message: Must be above 0 and under 25

name: females.6.12
label: Females 6-12
constraint_message: Must be above 0 and under 25

name: males.13.18
label: Males 13-18
constraint_message: Must be above 0 and under 25

name: females.13.18
label: Females 13-18
constraint_message: Must be above 0 and under 25

name: males.18.59
label: Males 19-59
constraint_message: Must be above 0 and under 25

name: females.18.59
label: Females  19-59
constraint_message: Must be above 0 and under 25

name: males.60.over
label: Males 60+
constraint_message: Must be above 0 and under 25

name: females.60.over
label: Female 60+
constraint_message: Must be above 0 and under 25

name: b2
label: Household size

name: household.size
label: What is the total household size?
hint: Members of the household who regularly share resources, such as water, food, and living space, not temporary visitors such as friends and family

name: household.size.note
label: The total household size provided does not match previously given household population data. Please double check the figures.

name: b3
label: Vulnerable household members

name: vulnerable.hh.note
label: How many members of the household fall into the following categories?
hint: Leave blank if the respondent doesn't wish to respond or doesn't know

name: unaccompanied.minor
label: Unaccompanied child/minor
hint: Not with primary caregiver or extended family, but the status of the parents is unclear or they are known to be alive. (count orphans separately in the next question)

name: orphan
label: Orphan
hint: Not with primary caregiver or extended family, but it is known that the parents are dead.

name: separated.minor
label: Separated child/minor
hint: Separated from his/her primary caregiver (usually parents) but still with his extended family (close relatives, usually)

name: chronic.ill
label: Suffering from a chronic illness or disease
hint: These typically include long term health issues such as disorders (digestive, haematological, neurological, respiratory, etc.), diseases (cardiovascular, cerebrovascular, etc.) and cancer

name: disabled
label: Suffering from a disability
hint: Intellectual (down syndrome, autism, fragile x syndrome etc), mental health problem (anxiety, depression, PTSD, bipolar disorder, esquizophrenia), physical and sensory (hearing, visual, physical, speech)

name: pregnant.lactating
label: Pregnant and/or lactating women
hint: Include both pregnant women and women that are breastfeeding
constraint_message: Number should not exceed number of females aged 6 and over in HH

name: C
label: Protection

name: biggest.needs
label: What do you think are the biggest needs of the household?
hint: i.e. what services need improving. Do not read the response options, select them based on their responses. If the respondent says more than 3 sources, prompt them to choose the primary 3.
constraint: not((selected(., "no_answer") or selected(., "none")) and count-selected(.) > 1) and not(count-selected(.) > 3)
constraint_message: You cannot choose "None" or "I don't know or I don't want to answer" with another answer. Cannot choose more than 3 responses

name: c1
label: Displacement

name: origin.location
label: Where did you/your household live most recently before being displaced to ${refugee_settlement}?
hint: Do not consider temporary stops along the way (e.g. staying with friends during the journey, reception center stay, etc.). Should only be the last place the household lived where they had planned to remain permanently or for a period longer than 3 months.

name: origin.location.other
label: Where did you/your household live most recently before being displaced to ${refugee_settlement}?
hint: Other, please specify:

name: origin.level.1
label: Where did you/your household live in ${origin_location}?

name: origin.level.1.other
label: Where did you/your household live in ${origin_location}?
hint: Other, please specify:

name: origin.level.2
label: Where did you/your household live in ${origin_level_1}?
relevant: not(selected(${origin_location}, "no_answer") or selected(${origin_level_1}, "no_answer") or selected(${origin_location}, "uganda_settlement") or selected(${origin_location}, "uganda_out_of_settlement"))

name: origin.level.2.other
label: Where did you/your household live in ${origin_level_1}?
hint: Other, please specify:

name: date.displaced
label: When was you/your household displaced from ${origin_level_2}, ${origin_level_1}?
hint: month, year

name: date.arrival
label: When did the household arrive in (${refugee_settlement})?
constraint_message: Date must be earlier than today and later than date of displacement

name: c2
label: Registration

name: origin.id
label: Does your household have identification from your country of origin?
hint: (e.g. birth certificates, national IDs, driver licenses)

name: registration
label: Is your household currently registered as refugees in Uganda?
hint: By registration, we mean that the household as an attestation letter or ID card provided by OPM. This does not include the verification process by UNHCR.

name: verification
label: Has your household verified their refugee status in Uganda through the ongoing UNHCR/OPM exercise?
hint: By verification, we mean the collection of biometric information (photographs, fingerprints, and iris images) started in 2018 to verify your existing OPM registration.

name: psn
label: Do any of the household members have a specific needs ID card provided by UNHCR or an NGO?
hint: This includes for example persons with disabilities, elderly persons, and pregnant/lactating women etc.

name: disabled.psn
label: How many of the disabled members of the household have a PSN ID?
hint: Skip if the respondent doesn't know. Probe if the number given is more than what was reported in the household demographics.
constraint_message: Can't be more than the number of disabled and can't be less than 0

name: pregnant.lactating.psn
label: How many of the pregnant/lactating members of the household have a PSN ID?
hint: Skip if the respondent doesn't know. Probe if the number given is more than what was reported in the household demographics.
constraint_message: Can't be more than the number of pregnant and/or lactating women and can't be less than 0

name: elderly.psn
label: How many of the elderly members of the household have a PSN ID?
hint: Skip if the respondent doesn't know. Probe if the number given is more than what was reported in the household demographics.
constraint_message: Can't be more than the number of elderly household members and can't be less than 0

name: born.uganda
label: Were any children in the household aged 5 or under born in Uganda?

name: born.uganda.number
label: How many children in the household aged 5 and under were born in Uganda?
hint: Skip if the respondent doesn't know.
constraint_message: Can't be more than the number of children 5 and under and can't be less than 0

name: born.uganda.registered
label: How many of these children born in Uganda have been registered at birth?
hint: Skip if the respondent doesn't know.
constraint_message: Can't be more than the number of children born in Uganda and can't be less than 0

name: child.prot.support.campaign
label: Have any members of the household been reached by child protection support awareness campaigns?
hint: This could be by: attending focus group discussions, dramas, or trainings; hearing messages on the radio or TV; working with community groups; etc.

name: psych.support.campaign
label: Have any members of the household been reached by psychosocial support awareness campaigns?
hint: This could be by: attending focus group discussions, dramas, or trainings; hearing messages on the radio or TV; working with community groups; etc.

name: sgbv.support.campaign
label: Have any members of the household been reached by sexual and gender based violence (SGBV) awareness campaigns?
hint: This could be by: attending focus group discussions, dramas, or trainings; hearing messages on the radio or TV; working with community groups; etc.

name: psych.distress
label: Are any members of the household scared or in psychological distress?
hint: While this is a self-assessment, this may include mild to crippling forms of depression, post-traumatic stress disorder (PTSD), anxiety, and/or psychosis

name: psych.distress.therapy
label: Have these members accessed psychosocial care?

name: c3
label: Children at risk

name: uasc.parent.location
label: Where are the parents of the separated or unaccompanied children living in the household?

name: uasc.prot.services
label: How many of the unaccompanied or separated children or orphans are receiving protection services?
hint: This could be follow-up, therapy, or other services provided by the government, UN, NGOs or other organizations. Skip if the respondent doesn't know.

name: family.reunion
label: How many of the unaccompanied or separated children are planned to be reunified with their parents in the next three months?
hint: This could be children going to join the parents, parents coming to the current location, or both parties going elsewhere to meet. Skip if the respondent doesn't know.

name: uasc.monitoring.visit
label: Have you ever had a monitoring visit to check on the unaccompanied children and/or orphans living in the household?
hint: Remember that unaccompanied children are those separated from parents and not still living with relatives/friends

name: uasc.monitoring.visit.date
label: When was the last monitoring visit to check on the unaccompanied children?
hint: Skip if the respondent doesn't know.

name: c4
label: Safety and security
hint: These questions are asking about general safety and security, not just about sexual and gender based violence (SGBV)

name: child.violence
label: Have any of the children in your household experiences violence, abuse, or exploitation in your current location?

name: security
label: How would you rate the safety and security of your household in your current location?
hint: Read the response options to the respondent.

name: insecurity.reasons
label: Why do you feel the safety and security of your household is not good here?
hint: Do not read the response options. If the respondent says more than 3 sources, prompt them to choose the primary 3.
constraint: not((selected(., "no_answer") or selected(., "none")) and count-selected(.) > 1) and not(count-selected(.) > 3)
constraint_message: You cannot choose "No security concerns" or "I don't know or I don't want to answer" with another answer. Cannot choose more than 3 responses

name: insecurity.reasons.other
label: Why do you feel the safety and security of your household is not good here?
hint: Other, please specify:

name: security.provider
label: Who does the household turn to for reporting and/or help when they experience security incidents?
hint: Do not read the response options. If the respondent says more than 3 sources, prompt them to choose the primary 3.
constraint: not((selected(., "no_answer") or selected(., "none")) and count-selected(.) > 1) and not(count-selected(.) > 3)
constraint_message: You cannot choose "Nobody" or "I don't know or I don't want to answer" with another answer. Cannot choose more than 3 responses

name: security.provider.other
label: Who does the household turn to for reporting and/or help when they experience security incidents?
hint: Other, please specify:

name: refugee.relations
label: How would you rate the relations of your household with refugees?
hint: If asking to refugees, this refers to other refugee households in the area.

name: host.relations
label: How would you rate the relations of your household with the local (host) community?
hint: If asking to host community, this refers to other local households in the area.

name: D
label: WASH

name: main.water.source
label: What water source (water for drinking, cooking and bathing) did your household use the most in the last 30 days?
hint: Select only one but don’t read the choices to the respondent. Protected means that the water source is protected from outside contaminants, especially fecal matter (e.g. four walls, lid, not open to the air).
constraint_message: A household must have at least one water source.

name: main.water.source.other
label: What water source (water for drinking, cooking and bathing) did your household use the most in the last 30 days?
hint: Other, please specify:

name: other.water.sources
label: What other water sources did your household use in the last 30 days?
hint: Select all that apply but don’t read the choices to the respondent. Do not select same source as the main water source.
constraint: (not(selected(., ${main_water_source})) or selected(., "other") or selected(., "dontknow")) and not((selected(., "none") or selected(., "dontknow")) and count-selected(.) > 1)
constraint_message: Cannot select same source as the main water source. Cannot select "None" or "I don't know or I don't want to answer" and then choose another answer.

name: other.water.sources.other
label: What other water sources did your household use in the last 30 days?
hint: Other, please specify:

name: adequate.water
label: Did you have enough water in the last 30 days to meet your household needs?

name: water.coping
label: How did you adjust for the lack of water?
hint: Select all that apply but do not read choices
constraint_message: Cannot select "We didn't use any coping mechanisms" or "I don't know or I don't want to answer" and then choose another answer.

name: water.coping.other
label: How did you adjust for the lack of water?
hint: Other, please specify:

name: piped.water.issues
label: Since your main water source is piped, why did you not have enough water in the last 30 days to meet your household needs?
constraint_message: Cannot select "No issues" or "I don't know or I don't want to answer" and then choose another answer.

name: piped.water.issues.other
label: Since your main water source is piped, why did you not have enough water in the last 30 days to meet your household needs?
hint: Other, please specify:

name: d1
label: Water collection

name: water.collection.time
label: How long does it take to get to the main water point, fetch water, and return (at the main time to collect water)?
hint: Select one, and only read choices if respondent has difficulties evaluating time. Select do not know if the respondent is unaware of time required to fetch water.

name: water.collection.issue
label: Does the activity of fetching water (distance and/or queuing time) constitute a problem for your household, and if yes, how?

name: collect.water
label: On average, how many days per week does someone from your household go to collect water?
hint: Skip the question if the respondent does not know
constraint_message: The number of days must be more than 0 and 7 or less.

name: d2
label: Container counting

name: containers
label: How many different containers were used the last day water was collected for the household?
hint: Ask the person to show you the containers so that you can assess the volume of the water containers. These should be for the uses of drinking, bathing, cooking, and laundry.
constraint_message: The number must be more than 0

name: d3
label: Containers used the LAST DAY water was collected. Record one by one.
hint: This includes all water collected morning, afternoon, and evening

name: capacity
label: What is the volume of container ${loop_position} (in litres)?
hint: Use the pictogram to identify the container and enter the amount of litres this container can hold. Ask the respondent if you can't identify the container from the pictogram.
constraint_message: The number must be more than 0 litres and less than 150 litres

name: journeys
label: How many times was container ${loop_position} filled on the day water was collected?
constraint_message: The number has to be more than 0 times and less than 30 times.

name: loop.position.test.note
label: Not all of the containers presented have had their volume and filling times calculated, please double check the loop.

name: water.days.last
label: How many days will this collected water last in total before you go and recollect water?
constraint_message: Must be more than 0 days.

name: d4
label: Water collection check

name: water.average.check.note
label: The total volume of water collected for household purposes is ${water_total}L. Over the ${water_days_last} days this water will last, the average number of litres per person per day of water is ${water_pppd}L.
hint: Please inform the respondent of these numbers and modify the previous answers if they do not seem accurate.

name: water.collection.typical
label: Does the information you provided above relate to an average day/typical day of water collection for you household?

name: d5
label: Sanitation

name: hh.latrine
label: Does your household have a household latrine specifically for members of this household only?

name: latrine.access
label: Do your household members have access to and use a functioning latrine?

name: latrine.share
label: How many households share usage of this latrine?
hint: The respondent can estimate, but if they don't know, skip the specific question
relevant: (selected(${latrine_access}, "some_members") or selected(${latrine_access}, "all_members") or selected(${latrine_access}, "all_access_some_use")) and selected(${hh_latrine}, "no")

name: latrine.share.segregated
label: Does this shared latrine have separate stalls for men and women to use?

name: latrine.access.problem
label: Why do household members have problems accessing and using functional latrines?
hint: Select all that apply, but do not read options to the respondent.
constraint_message: You cannot choose "I don't know or I don't want to answer" with another answer.

name: latrine.access.problem.other
label: Why do household members have problems accessing and using functional latrines?
hint: Other, please specify:

name: no.latrine.access.who
label: Who does not access or use the latrines in your household?

name: d6
label: Hygiene

name: soap
label: Do you have soap in your household for handwashing?
hint: Ask to see soap and confirm with observation (can be liquid soap, bar soap, etc.)

name: no.soap.why
label: Why don’t you have soap for handwashing?

name: no.soap.why.other
label: Why don’t you have soap for handwashing?
hint: Other, please specify:

name: handwash.occasions
label: When do you wash your hands?
hint: Specify the focus on activities (e.g. before eating), not times of the day (e.g. in the morning). Select all that apply but don’t read the choices to the respondent.
constraint_message: You cannot choose "I don't know or I don't want to answer" with another answer.

name: handwash.occasions.other
label: If other, please describe

name: d7
label: Hygiene Promotion

name: hygiene.promotion
label: Did you or a member of your household receive hygiene promotion messaging or training in the last 30 days?
hint: This could come from a specific hygiene promoter or a village health team

name: hygiene.promotion.last
label: When was the last time you or a member of your household received hygiene promotion messaging or training?
hint: This could come from a specific hygiene promoter or a village health team

name: E
label: Livelihoods and environment

name: primary.livelihoods
label: What were your household's primary income sources over the last 30 days?
hint: Do not read the response options. If the respondent says more than 3 sources, prompt them to choose the primary 3.
constraint: count-selected(.) <= 3 and not((selected(.,"none") or selected(., "no_answer")) and count-selected(.) > 1)

name: primary.livelihoods.other
label: What were your household's primary income sources over the last 30 days?
hint: Other, please specify:

name: hh.member.earning
label: Have any members of your household earned an income over the last 30 days?

name: hh.member.earning.number
label: How many household members earned an income over the last 30 days?
constraint_message: Number must be less than the household size.

name: hh.member.response.staff
label: Do any of these income earning members of the household work in a job directly related to the refugee response?
hint: e.g. staff for OPM, UNHCR, NGOs, etc.

name: livelihoods.coping.strategies
label: In the past 30 days, what coping strategies have members of the househould performed to support itself?
hint: Do not read the response options.
constraint_message: You cannot choose "Did not engage in any other activity to support the household" or "I don't know or I don't want to answer" with another answer.

name: livelihoods.coping.strategies.other
label: In the past 30 days, what coping strategies have members of the househould performed to support itself?
hint: Other, please specify:

name: savings.associations
label: Do any members of your household participate in community-based savings/loan/insurance schemes?
hint: e.g. village savings and loan associations (VSLAs), savings and credit cooperative societies (SACCOs), etc.

name: vocational.training
label: Have any members of your household participated in vocational trainings?
hint: i.e. long-term, accredited training at a specific institution

name: e1
label: Cultivation

name: ag.inputs
label: Did your household have access to seeds and planting materials in the most recent harvest/agricultural season?
hint: e.g. seeds, fertilizers, shovels, spades, etc.

name: agricultural.land
label: Did your household have access to agricultural land for cultivation in the most recent harvest/agricultural season?

name: agricultural.land.how
label: How did your household access agricultural land for cultivation in the most recent harvest/agricultural season?

name: agricultural.land.how.other
label: How did your household access agricultural land for cultivation in the most recent harvest/agricultural season?
hint: Other, please specify:

name: agricultural.land.sufficiency
label: Was the agricultural land your household accessed in most recent harvest/agricultural season sufficient to provide food for your entire household?
hint: Sufficient means that the size and quality of the land could produce enough food for the household.

name: cultivation
label: Did your household cultivate or plant crops in the most recent harvest/agricultural season?

name: no.cultivation.why
label: What were your household's reasons for not cultivating?
constraint_message: You cannot choose  "I don't know or I don't want to answer" with another answer.

name: ag.kit
label: Has your household ever received an NGO distribution of tools or other inputs for agricultural purposes?
hint: e.g. seeds, shovels, spades, storage silos, etc.

name: ag.kit.usability
label: Are the distributed tools/items you received still usable by the household?
hint: Even if the household didn't cultivate in the previous season, ask if the items are useable if they did cultivate

name: ag.kit.disuse.why
label: Why is your household no longer able to use the distributed tools/items?

name: ag.training
label: Have any members of your household ever received training in agricultural/farming techniques?
hint: e.g. post-harvest management, storage techniques, collective marketing, agroforestry, soil/water conservation, etc.

name: e2
label: Livestock

name: livestock
label: Does your household own livestock?
hint: e.g. cattle, sheep, goats

name: poultry
label: Does your household own chickens?

name: F
label: Food assistance

name: food.distributions
label: Does your household have a ration card so they can receive in-kind food or cash for the purposes of buying food?

name: food.distributions.date
label: When did your household last receive in-kind food or cash for the purposes of buying food?

name: main.food.source
label: What was the main source of the food in the past 7 days? (do not read out list)

name: main.source.food.other
label: What was the main source of the food in the past 7 days? (do not read out list)
hint: Other, please specify:

name: sufficient.food
label: Did your household have access to sufficient food for all members in the past 7 days?

name: food.coping
label: In the past 7 days, what food consumption coping strategies have been used to cope with this lack of sufficient food?

name: food.coping.other
label: If other, please describe

name: market.by.walk
label: Is there a market within walking distance from your household?

name: market.access
label: In the last 30 days, did your household face any problems accessing markets to buy/sell agricultural products or livestock?

name: f1
label: Over the last 7 days, on how many days did you consume the following foods?
hint: The respondent can estimate, but if they don't know, skip the specific question

name: cereals
label: Cereals and grain: Rice, bread / cake and / or donuts, sorghum, millet, maize, chapatti.
constraint_message: Cannot be more than 7 days

name: tubers
label: Roots and tubers:  potato, yam, cassava, sweet potato, and / or other tubers
constraint_message: Cannot be more than 7 days

name: pulses
label: Pulses: beans, cowpeas, lentils, soy, pigeon pea
constraint_message: Cannot be more than 7 days

name: nuts
label: Nuts: ground nuts, peanuts, sim sim, coconuts or other nuts
constraint_message: Cannot be more than 7 days

name: orange.vegetables
label: Orange vegetables (vegetables rich in Vitamin A): carrot, red pepper, pumpkin, orange sweet potatoes,
constraint_message: Cannot be more than 7 days

name: green.vegetables
label: Green leafy vegetables:, spinach, broccoli, amaranth and / or other dark green leaves, cassava leaves, bean leaves, pea leaves.
constraint_message: Cannot be more than 7 days

name: other.vegetables
label: Other vegetables: onion, tomatoes, cucumber, radishes, green beans, peas, lettuce, cabbage, etc.
constraint_message: Cannot be more than 7 days

name: orange.fruits
label: Orange fruits (Fruits rich in Vitamin A): mango, papaya, apricot, peach
constraint_message: Cannot be more than 7 days

name: other.fruits
label: Other Fruits: banana, apple, lemon, tangerine
constraint_message: Cannot be more than 7 days

name: meat
label: Meat: goat, beef, chicken, pork
hint: Report only meat consumed in large quantities and not as a condiment. Does not include offal.
constraint_message: Cannot be more than 7 days

name: offal
label: Liver, kidney, heart and / or other organ meats and blood
constraint_message: Cannot be more than 7 days

name: fish
label: Fish / Shellfish: fish, including canned tuna, and/or other seafood
hint: Report only fish consumed in large quantities and not as a condiment.
constraint_message: Cannot be more than 7 days

name: eggs
label: Eggs
constraint_message: Cannot be more than 7 days

name: dairy
label: Milk and other dairy products: fresh milk / sour, yogurt, cheese, other dairy products
hint: Does NOT include margarine, butter, and small amounts of milk for tea/coffee.
constraint_message: Cannot be more than 7 days

name: oils
label: Oil / fat / butter: vegetable oil, palm oil, shea butter, margarine, other fats / oil
constraint_message: Cannot be more than 7 days

name: sugars
label: Sugar, or sweet: sugar, honey, jam, cakes, candy, cookies, pastries, cakes and other sweet (sugary drinks)
constraint_message: Cannot be more than 7 days

name: condiments
label: Condiments / Spices: tea, coffee / cocoa, salt, garlic, spices, yeast / baking powder, lanwin, tomato / sauce, meat or fish as a condiment, condiments including small amount of milk / tea coffee.
constraint_message: Cannot be more than 7 days

name: G
label: Health and nutrition

name: primary.hc.provider
label: Your household most often goes to what type of health facility for treatment or check-up?
hint: This should be the health facility the members of the household use most often.

name: primary.hc.provider.other
label: Your household most often goes to what type of health facility for treatment or check-up?
hint: Other, please specify:

name: health.needs
label: Has anyone in the house needed healthcare treatment in the past year?

name: health.needs.when
label: When was the most recent time a member of the household needed healthcare treatment?

name: treatment.sought
label: For this most recent incident, did this person seek medical care for this healthcare issue?

name: treatment.access
label: For this most recent incident, did this person have any trouble accessing the health care they needed?

name: treatment.access.difficulty
label: What are the main challenges this person had when accessing the healthcare they needed?
hint: Do not read the response options. If the respondent says more than 3 sources, prompt them to choose the primary 3.
constraint_message: You cannot choose  "I don't know or I don't want to answer" with another answer. Cannot choose more than 3 responses

name: treatment.access.difficulty.other
label: What are the main challenges this person had when accessing the healthcare they needed?
hint: Other, please specify:

name: health.issues
label: In the most recent 2 weeks, have any of the household members experienced any significant health issues?
hint: These include everything in the following list or more: extreme stress, physical injry, diarrhoea, malnutrition, respiratory tract infection, skin disease, swollen feet, measles, high blood pressure, asthma, TB, malaria, complications in child birth, etc.

name: g1
label: How many individuals have suffered from these issues in the most recent 2 weeks?
hint: The respondent can estimate, but if they don't know, skip the specific question. DO NOT SKIP IF THE RESPONDENT SAYS 0, WRITE 0.

name: stress
label: Extreme stress

name: minor.injury
label: Minor physical injuries

name: serious.injury
label: Serious physical injuries

name: diarrhoea
label: Diarrhoea

name: rapid.weight.loss
label: Extreme weight loss
hint: This is weight loss that is rapid and unhealthy, typically due to poor diet and inability to access food with sufficient nutrients. Most commonly seen in children but also possible for peoples of all ages.

name: respiratory.infection
label: Respiratory tract infection

name: skin
label: Skin disease

name: feet
label: Swollen feet

name: measles
label: Measles

name: hypertension
label: High blood pressure

name: asthma
label: Asthma

name: tb
label: TB

name: malaria
label: Malaria

name: child.birth
label: Complications in child birth

name: health.other
label: Other

name: health.issues.other
label: Other, please specify the event:

name: young.child.diarrhoea
label: In the past 7 days has any child 5 or under in your household suffered from diarrhoea?

name: child.diarrhoea
label: In the past 7 days has any child aged 6-18 in your household suffered from diarrhoea?

name: adult.diarrehoa
label: In the past 7 days has any adult (19 years or over) in your household suffered from diarrhoea?

name: polio.vaccine
label: Have any of the individuals 5 years old or under been vaccinated against polio?(ask to see the card/cards if yes)
hint: The polio vaccine is a series of 4 vaccinations. If the child has started these vaccinations, then we should count it as yes.

name: polio.vaccine.number
label: How many of the individuals 5 years old or under have been vaccinated against polio?
hint: The respondent can estimate, but if they don't know, skip the specific question. The polio vaccine is a series of 4 vaccinations. If the child has started these vaccinations, then we should count it as yes.
constraint_message: Number must not exceed total number of children at or under 5 in HH

name: measles.vaccine
label: Have any of the individuals 15 years old or under been vaccinated against measles? (ask to see the card/cards if yes)

name: measles.vaccine.number
label: How many of the individuals 15 years old or under have been vaccinated against measles?
hint: The respondent can estimate, but if they don't know, skip the specific question.
constraint_message: Number must not exceed total number of children at or under 5 in HH

name: vitamin.supplement
label: Have any of the individuals 5 years old or under received vitamin A supplementation in the past 6 months?

name: vitamin.supplement.number
label: How many of the individuals 5 years old or under received vitamin A supplementation in the past 6 months?
hint: The respondent can estimate, but if they don't know, skip the specific question.
constraint_message: Number must not exceed total number of children at or under 5 in HH

name: treated.nets
label: Does your household have an insecticide treated mosquito net?
hint: Treatment should've been sprayed within one year

name: sleeping.under.nets
label: How many family members slept under the net last night?
hint: The respondent can estimate, but if they don't know, skip the specific question.

name: g2
label: Pregnant and/or lactating women

label: Have any of the pregnant/lactating women in the household received counselling on infant and young child feeding?

hint: The respondent can estimate, but if they don't know, skip the specific question
constraint_message: Number must not exceed the number of pregnant and lactating women in the HH

name: nutr.supplement
label: Have any of the pregnant/lactating women in the household have received iron and folic acid supplements or micronutrient supplements?

label: How many of the pregnant/lactating women in the household have received iron and folic acid supplements or micronutrient supplements?
hint: The respondent can estimate, but if they don't know, skip the specific question
constraint_message: Number must not exceed the number of pregnant and lactating women in the HH

name: fanidar.dose
label: Have any of the pregnant/lactating women in the household have received at least 2 doses of fanidar?

name: fanidar.dose.number
label: How many of the pregnant/lactating women in the household have received at least 2 doses of fanidar?
hint: The respondent can estimate, but if they don't know, skip the specific question
constraint_message: Number must not exceed the number of pregnant and lactating women in the HH

name: H
label: Site, shelter, and NFIs

name: h1
label: Do you have access to or own the following items? If yes, for how many?
hint: If the respondent does not know, skip the question.

name: access.to.buckets
label: Number of buckets with lid

name: access.to.jerry.can
label: Number of jerry cans

name: access.to.pots
label: Number of pot(s) of 5L and more

name: access.to.sleeping.mats
label: Number of sleeping mats
hint: Papyrus mat or otherwise thin mat for laying, not a full mattress

name: access.to.mattress
label: Number of sleeping mattresses
hint: Usually made from spring or thick foam, much thicker than a regular mat

name: access.to.tarpaulin
label: Plastic tarpaulin

name: access.to.torches
label: Number of lights / torches

name: h2
label: NFI access and needs

name: kitchen.set
label: Do you have a kitchen set?
hint: Household set of plates, cups, cutlery, serving utensils, pots, and cleaning equipment

name: sanitary.pads
label: Do the females in your household currently have access to sanitary pads?

name: improved.cook.stove
label: Does the household have an improved cooking stove, such as an energy saving stove?
hint: Improved stoves typically contain a specially designed device on the bottom that takes less firewood and produces less fumes than a typical stove. Confirm answer with observation if possible

name: nfi.needs
label: What are the main NFI needs of the household?
hint: Do not read the response options. If the respondent says more than 3 sources, prompt them to choose the primary 3.
constraint: not((selected(., "no_answer") or selected(., "none")) and count-selected(.) > 1) and not(count-selected(.) > 3)
constraint_message: You cannot choose "None" or "I don't know or I don't want to answer" with another answer. Cannot choose more than 3 responses

name: nfi.needs.other
label: What are the main NFI needs of the household?
hint: Other, please specify:

label: How many families, including yours, share your shelter?

name: shelter.flooding
label: Has this shelter experienced flooding in the past year?

name: shelter.leaking
label: Is your shelter prone to leaking when it rains?

name: main.fuel.source
label: What is your households primary fuel source?
